title: As per the provisions of the Persons with Disabilities Act, 1995, seven categories of disabilities have been identified viz
clause_text: As per the provisions of the Persons with Disabilities Act, 1995, seven categories of disabilities have been identified viz., blindness, low vision, leprosy cured, hearing impairment, locomotor disability, mental retardation and mental illness. Persons falling under the above categories with a minimum of 40% disability are covered under Differently Abled People. The provisions made under Differently Abled People are also applicable to elderly, pregnant women and mothers with small children on prams.
